value.title: Searching for a Column in the Entire Data Source Using Table ColumnNames Power Query function of Pow
value.excerpt: Link to the blog post with full details of step by step example: http://radacad.com/search-for-a-column-in-the-entire-database-with-table-columnnames-in-power-query-and-power-bi
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ZvqeUg-HfuY" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Sort Column Name in Power Query via M Code
value.excerpt: In this short video I have shown how to sort columns inside Power query  Sortcol = Table.ReorderColumns(#"Changed Type", List.Sort(Table.ColumnNames(#"Changed Type")))  see blog post https://radacad.com/sort-column-name-in-power-query-via-m-code
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/FupobJF1LDY" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>
